column3: mona bi wɔ hɔ a dwetɛ wɔ mu
column4: Na bea bi wɔ hɔ ma sika a wɔhor."

column3: Na boran wɔnan fi ɔbo mu."

column2: "Nyimpa tum ma sum no tun twa: Ɔbɔntse araa kodu ekyirekyir Dze hwehwɛ sum kebii na owu no nwinwin mu abo."
"Na otu mona kronn kɔ mbrɛ nyimpa biara nntse hɔ; Anamɔn a otwa mu no werɛ fir no; Oefi nyimpa nkyɛn sensɛn ekyirekyir
column3: oridzi adande."

column2: "Asaase a edziban fi mu ba no: Ɔdan n’ase ba sor dɛ gya."
"N’abo no mu nye hoabo ne dabew
column3: Na ɔwɔ sikamfutuw so wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Ɔkwan no anoma edzinam bi nnyi mu
column3: Nkyii so ɔkom enyiwa nnhunii."
Na eso gyata bɔyafo nntwa mu hɔ."

column2: "Ɔtsen ne nsa ka ɔtwerɛbo botan; Obutuw mbepɔw wɔ no ndwow mu."
"Ɔno na otwitwa abotan mu aka; Na n’enyiwa hu adze a ɔsom bo biara."
"Ɔno na osisiw esutsen kwan ma ɔnnsosɔw; Na adze a osuma no
column3: ɔno na oyi pue kan mu."
hen na wobohu no? Na ntseasee ananmu so wɔ hen?"

column2: "Dasanyi nnyim no bo; Nkyii so wonnhu no wɔ atseasefo asaase do."

column3: Onnyi mo mu: Na po so se dɛ
Nkyii so wonnker dwetɛ mma ne tsibo."
Wɔmmfa epopobibirbo a ɔsom bo

column2: "Sika na ahwehwɛ nnye no nnsɛ: Nkyii so wɔmmfa sika mapa n’edwindze nnsesa."

column3: nyansa no bo sen mbota dze."
Nkyii so wɔmmfa sika mapa nntwa ne tsibo."

column2: "Nna dɛm a henfa koraa na nyansa fi ba? Na ntseasee ananmu so wɔ henfa?"

column3: Na wɔdze akam sor ntumbowa."
Yɛdze hɛn aso atse ne nka."
Na ɔno na onyim ne tsenabew."
Na ohu sor nyina ase:"

column2: "Aber a ɔhyɛɛ mframa dur too hɔ: Nyew
column3: osusu nsu dɛ mbrɛ no nsusui tse no."
Na ɔyɛɛ kwan maa senaman n’enyinam no:"
na ɔdaa no edzi; Otsintsiim no
Hwɛ
column5: nye nyansa; Na irifi bɔn ho eguan
